create_call.description: Creates a new call in Avoma

props.name: external_id
props.description: Unique id of the call from the dialer system like hubspot, twilio, zoom, etc.

props.name: user_email
props.description: Email of the user who made or received the call. This should be an Avoma user\

props.name: source
props.description: Source of the call

props.name: direction
props.description: Direction of the call

props.name: start_at
props.description: Start time of the call

props.name: frm
props.description: Phone number from which call was made (e.g., +11234567890)

props.name: to
props.description: Phone number to which call was made (e.g., +12234567890)

props.name: recording_url
props.description: URL of the recording of the call. This should be a public URL that Avoma can access.

props.name: participants
props.description: List of participants in the call. First entry should be the prospect/lead.

props.name: name
props.description: Name of the participant

props.name: email
props.description: Email of the participant

props.name: crm_id
props.description: CRM record ID for this participant (optional)

props.name: crm_type
props.description: Type of CRM record (e.g., contact, lead, opportunity)

props.name: crm_system
props.description: CRM system name (e.g., hubspot, salesforce)

props.name: end_at
props.description: End time of the call

props.name: frm_name
props.description: Name of the caller who made the call

props.name: to_name
props.description: Name of the person to whom call was made

props.name: answered
props.description: Whether the call was answered

props.name: is_voicemail
props.description: Indicates if the call is a voicemail

props.name: additional_details
props.description: Additional details of the call (JSON object as string)

get_meeting_recording.description: Returns video and audio recording URLs for a given meeting

get_meeting_transcription.description: Returns transcription with speakers, timestamps, and VTT file URL

meeting_cancelled.description: Triggers when a meeting booked via the scheduling page is cancelled

meeting_rescheduled.description: Triggers when a scheduled meeting is rescheduled

new_meeting_scheduled.description: Triggers when a meeting is booked via one of your Avoma scheduling pages

new_note.description: Triggers when notes are successfully generated for meetings or calls
